alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 1:17PM PST until December 27 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create areas of blowing and driving snow. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
